languages.text: "Лорд-капитан! По нам совершен залп абордажными торпедами! Кажется, враг решил разделаться с нами одним штурмовым ударом".
"Lord Captain! They have fired boarding torpedoes! It looks like the enemy has decided to take us down with a single decisive strike."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан! По нам совершен залп абордажными торпедами! Кажется, враг решил разделаться с нами одним штурмовым ударом".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! They have fired boarding torpedoes! It looks like the enemy has decided to take us down with a single decisive strike."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! They have fired boarding torpedoes! It looks like the enemy has decided to take us down with a single decisive strike."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! They have fired boarding torpedoes! It looks like the enemy has decided to take us down with a single decisive strike."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! They have fired boarding torpedoes! It looks like the enemy has decided to take us down with a single decisive strike."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! They have fired boarding torpedoes! It looks like the enemy has decided to take us down with a single decisive strike."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! L'ennemi a tiré des torpilles d'abordage ! Sa stratégie semble être de nous neutraliser en un seul assaut décisif. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! They have fired boarding torpedoes! It looks like the enemy has decided to take us down with a single decisive strike."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! L'ennemi a tiré des torpilles d’abordage ! Sa stratégie semble être de nous neutraliser en un seul assaut décisif. »
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: “舰长大人！他们发射了登舰鱼雷！看来敌人打算把我们一举歼灭！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! They have fired boarding torpedoes! It looks like the enemy has decided to take us down with a single decisive strike."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人！他们发射了登舰鱼雷！看来敌人打算把我们一举歼灭！”
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "Lord Captain! Sie haben Entertorpedos abgefeuert! Der Feind hat offenbar entschieden, uns mit einem einzigen, verheerenden Angriff auszuschalten."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! They have fired boarding torpedoes! It looks like the enemy has decided to take us down with a single decisive strike."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Sie haben Entertorpedos abgefeuert! Der Feind hat offenbar entschieden, uns mit einem einzigen, verheerenden Angriff auszuschalten."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán! ¡Han disparado torpedos de abordaje! Parece que el enemigo quiere acabar con nosotros de un solo golpe».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! They have fired boarding torpedoes! It looks like the enemy has decided to take us down with a single decisive strike."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán! ¡Han disparado torpedos de abordaje! Parece que el enemigo quiere acabar con nosotros de un solo golpe».
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！敵が移乗突入魚雷を発射しました！一撃でこちらを仕留める気です」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! They have fired boarding torpedoes! It looks like the enemy has decided to take us down with a single decisive strike."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！敵が移乗突入魚雷を発射しました！一撃でこちらを仕留める気です」
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan! Borda torpidoları ateşlediler! Belli ki düşmanımız bizi tek hamlede alt etmeyi hedefliyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! They have fired boarding torpedoes! It looks like the enemy has decided to take us down with a single decisive strike."
